Posts.Content: Ellie7256 wrote: I'm 52 years old. I went to the doctors on the 9th and he scheduled me for a mammogram. On the 17th my doctor called me and said they found something and said they have now scheduled me to have a compression mammogram done. on the 21st. While I was at the hospital having the second mammogram the tech came in and told me that the radiologist want to get an ultrasound down right away. I went from 1 room to another. And now its a waiting game. and i am so depressed i cant stand it anymore. My grandmother {mom's mom} died from breast cancer about 5 years ago. and right now my mom is fighting cancer she is going thru chemo her cancer is in her neck they operated on her took out the cancer. they treated her with radiation an chemo. Now they are trying for the spot in her lung.i dont want to tell mom she has enough stuff to worry about  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: afraid, angry a lot of emotions going on Ellie7256 nowheregirl
